value:
$WmMPID_マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You've done well to make it so far.
Clearly, you people are devoted
to the cause of peace.$k$pIn truth, that speaks to my heart.
We are kindred spirits. I wish
that we had met as allies.$k$pBut I must abide by the contract
that binds us until it is broken.
Can you break it, I wonder?$k$pIt's time to find out with an honest
battle. Do your best. And I will
do mine!$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You have proved your power, and
I am glad to say that you have
broken the contract.$k$pYou have my gratitude for freeing
us from Veronica. I hope that we
will meet again someday.$k

$Sbs2000|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Well done, everyone. We've saved
their world and our kingdom.
At least for now.$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_02,0|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|How frightfully boring.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Princess Veronica!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|After all the trouble I went through,
making Marth and those others
pawns of our empire...$k$pWhy did you free them?$k$pNo matter. I have far more powerful
forces at my beck and call.$k$pIf I wish you dead, they will oblige.
And...do I want that? Oh, yes.
I very much do.$k$pNow, just you wait there while I
call them over...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|We must retreat. We don't have
the strength to face her.$k$p$EFace_Cool|We need to get back to our castle
to regroup!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Going so soon? And just when I was
getting ready to play! I suppose I'll
go home.$k$p$EFace|You'd better get ready for what's
coming next. Oh, the Heroes you're
going to meet!$k$Sbs150|
